metadata.title: HVAC Technician Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for HVAC Technician positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with over 6 years of experience in installing and servicing heating and cooling systems. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior HVAC Technician
achievements: Lead a team of 5 technicians in the installation of HVAC systems in commercial buildings, resulting in a 20% increase in overall efficiency.
Implemented preventive maintenance schedules, reducing emergency repair calls by 35%.
Trained junior technicians, improving team productivity by 25%.

experience.title: HVAC Technician
achievements: Successfully completed over 300 installation and repair projects with a customer satisfaction rate of 95%.
Pioneered a toolkit approach that accelerated the diagnostic process by 15%.
Collaborated with senior engineers in developing an energy-efficient solution for residential clients.

experience.title: Junior HVAC Technician
achievements: Assisted in the installation of over 150 HVAC units with a focus on quality and efficiency.
Developed a quick-reference guide for troubleshooting common HVAC issues, adopted by the entire team.
Awarded 'Rookie of the Year' for outstanding dedication and performance.

projects.name: Energy Efficiency Optimization
projects.description: Led a project to optimize energy usage in HVAC systems across a commercial fleet, resulting in a 15% reduction in energy consumption.
